# Allen Hayward

![Allen Hayward](https://www.hermiston.gov/sites/default/files/styles/full_node_primary/public/imageattachments/directory/9501/allen_hayward_web.jpg?itok=FRM0v7Lt)

Position: 

At Large

Email: 

[ahayward@hermiston.gov](mailto:ahayward@hermiston.gov)

Allen attended Hermiston High School and graduated in 2001. During this time, he became actively involved in Campus Life where he would help Director Rod Bragato with sound and audio during the many events at Campus Life. This, along with the help of Rod Bragato and many other in the community, would help mold Allen into the man he is today. Allen attended  a few churches in town before settling down at Zeal Church, where they have helped form Allen into the man God has called him to be. Allen loves to play and work on computers, and takes pride in helping others learn technology as he considers himself a tech guru.  Allen is a family man and enjoys time with his wife Kristan, and 2 daughters Joy and Bela. 

### Council Appointment

Allen was elected in November 2024 and chose to run because " As a proud Christian man, I want to make Hermiston a better place to raise a family. Communication is key to being a great leader, and I firmly believe it starts with knowing what the concerns are from the people in this town."

 

Four-year term, expires: 12/31/2028
